title: What was it like to be a Gladiator in the Colosseum?
description:
Why was The Roman Colosseum built? What kind of events took place in the Colosseum? What secrets lie beneath the Colosseum?

itunes:title: What was it like to be a Gladiator in the Colosseum?
itunes:summary: Learn all about the history of The Colosseum, the largest amphitheater ever built, and what it was like to be a Gladiator back in early Rome!
